sentences.simplifiedText: 看了看远处的天空，他决定延长旅行计划，想要更深入地了解这个城市。
sentences.traditionalText: 看了看遠處的天空，他決定延長旅行計劃，想要更深入地了解這個城市。
sentences.pinyin: kànle kàn yuǎn chù de tiānkōng, tā juédìng yáncháng lǚxíng jìhuà, xiǎng yào gèng shēnrù dì liǎojiě zhège chéngshì.
sentences.translation: Looking at the distant sky, he decided to prolong the travel plan, wanting to understand this city more deeply.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他询问能否延长付款日期。
sentences.traditionalText: 他詢問能否延長付款日期。
sentences.pinyin: Tā xúnwèn néng fǒu yáncháng fùkuǎn rìqī.
sentences.translation: He asked if he could delay the payment date.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于特殊情况，他们不得不延长项目完成的时间。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於特殊情況，他們不得不延長項目完成的時間。
sentences.pinyin: Yóu yú tèshū qíngkuàng, tāmen bùdébù yáncháng xiàngmù wánchéng de shíjiān.
sentences.translation: Due to special circumstances, they had to delay the time to complete the project.
